messages.content: Mary Simmons works with Steven Scott.
Steven Scott is a colleague of Kayla Graham.
Kayla Graham works with Bradley Jackson.
Bradley Jackson is a colleague of Paul Fisher.
Paul Fisher works with Christina Hayes.
Christina Hayes is a colleague of Arthur Torres.
Arthur Torres works with Anna Jordan.
Anna Jordan is a colleague of Lawrence Howard.
Lawrence Howard works with Stephanie Alvarez.
Stephanie Alvarez is a colleague of Donna Long.

queries.question: Are Mary Simmons and Donna Long related to each other at work through colleagues relations?

reference_answer.text: Yes, they are indirect colleagues according to their graph relations.
